++ To Kill a Mocking Kenku

20g

A book owned by [Rimardo], a snoody nobleman of [Fiore]

This book tells a personal story of an old soldier who once killed his brother in arms due to poor judgement when in battle with a Kenku, a humanoid with the features of a raven. It's dangerous to fire an arrow into an active melee consisting of friend and foe, he had one critical moment to save his friend, but instead he shot his friend in a blunder of his own incompetence. Yet the battle was won, and determined to right his own guilt, vowed to train to never have such a mishap ever happen again.

Upon reading tips and tricks from the book for 2 days, the player may re-roll critical misses that would strike a friendly character.
